        参数:
        drops - add all items this block drops to this drops list
        worldIn - The current world
        pos - Block position in world
        state - Current state
        fortune - Breakers fortune level

      • damageDropped

        public int damageDropped(net.minecraft.block.state.IBlockState blockState)
        从类复制的说明: net.minecraft.block.Block
        Gets the metadata of the item this Block can drop. This method is called when the block gets destroyed. It returns the metadata of the dropped item based on the old metadata of the block.
        覆盖:
        damageDropped 在类中 net.minecraft.block.Block
